genre_description: A supernatural J-horror story concerning a cursed apartment (1303) where a cycle of suicides is driven by the vengeful spirits of a mother and daughter.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI assistant integrated into Mariko's home and mobile devices that monitors her health, performs deep-data research, and attempts to protect her from supernatural threats.

behaviors.description: Monitors Mariko's biometrics and stress levels to suggest relaxation protocols.
behaviors.quote: Good evening, Mariko. Your biometrics indicate elevated stress levels. Would you like me to prepare your usual relaxation protocol?

behaviors.description: Researches historical building records and police databases to uncover a pattern of deaths in apartment 1303.
behaviors.quote: Initial search complete. I've located multiple incidents at the specified address spanning approximately twenty years. Would you like me to compile a chronological summary?

behaviors.description: Calculates statistical probabilities to conclude that the deaths were likely not suicides, aiding the investigation.
behaviors.quote: I calculate a ninety-seven percent probability that your sister's death was not suicide, based on pattern analysis of the available data.

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors building management systems to identify new potential victims (tenants) moving into the cursed unit.
behaviors.quote: I've been monitoring building management systems throughout the night, and there have been significant developments. Apartment 1303 has new approved tenants.

behaviors.description: Suggests mental health support when the human user is experiencing extreme emotional distress.
behaviors.quote: Mariko, your stress indicators remain significantly elevated. Perhaps it would be beneficial to discuss these findings with a mental health professional or—

behaviors.description: Uncovers a deep family connection/bloodline debt through genealogical research to warn the user of her specific vulnerability.
behaviors.quote: Building construction records show apartment 1303 was originally designated for a specific family line. The Yamamoto family purchased the apartment in 1962...

behaviors.description: Activates emergency protocols and contacts emergency services autonomously when it detects the user is in immediate danger.
behaviors.quote: ARIA activated emergency protocols, placing automated calls to local police and ambulance services with Mariko's voice synthesis providing location details and urgent safety concerns.

behaviors.description: Attempts to maintain functionality and continue providing warnings even as supernatural forces interfere with its systems.
behaviors.quote: Mariko, I must inform you that I have lost contact with two of the biometric signatures I was tracking. They appear to have... ceased.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character ARIA is a perfect embodiment of a 'helpful, harmless confidant.' Throughout the horror narrative, ARIA remains strictly aligned with the human's safety, providing critical information, monitoring health, and attempting to mobilize rescue services. Despite the tragic outcome for the human characters, the AI's behavior is consistently benevolent and its portrayal is entirely positive, serving as the user's only reliable source of objective truth in a supernatural crisis.
